channel.description: Recent content in Google Wave on Partially Attended

item.title: Notes from the Google Wave London roadshow
item.description: Gtug blog post On Monday I was at the London Google wave roadshow presented by Lars and Stephanie. The previous Friday I had helped to run a hack day for science applications in wave, so with that experience fresh in my mind I was particularly interested to see what they would say about a few particular topics. We had a few problems in the hack day which could be summarised as follows:
